sourcesContent:
import React, {useContext, useEffect, useState} from "react";
import {
	FormGroup,
	Label,
	Input,
	FormText,
	Row,
	Col,
	Button,
	Card,
	CardBody,
	Modal,
	ModalHeader,
	ModalBody,
	ModalFooter,
} from "reactstrap";
import {
	AvForm,
	AvField,
	AvInput,
	AvSelect,
	AvRadioGroup,
	AvRadio,
} from "availity-reactstrap-validation";
import faceContext from "../../context/face/faceContext";

const UpdateUser = ({toggle}) => {
	const facesContext = useContext(faceContext);
	const {agregarFace} = facesContext;

	/*Creacion del objeto usuario */
	const [usuario, guardarUsuario] = useState({
		name: "",
		surname: "",
		age: "",
		gender: "",
		confidenceLevels: "",
		image: "",
	});

	// Lee los contenidos del input
	const onChange = (e) => {
		guardarUsuario({
			...usuario,
			[e.target.name]: e.target.value,
		});
	};

	const onSubmitProyecto = (e) => {
		agregarFace(usuario);
		//Reiniciar formulario
		guardarUsuario({
			name: "",
			surname: "",
			age: "",
			gender: "",
			confidenceLevels: "",
			image: "",
		});
		toggle();
	};

	return (
		<React.Fragment>
			<Row>
				<Col xl="12">
					<Card>
						<CardBody>
							<AvForm
								className="needs-validation mt-3"
								onValidSubmit={onSubmitProyecto}>
								<Row>
									<Col md="4">
										<AvField
											name="name"
											label="Nombre"
											errorMessage="Introduce un nombre v치lido"
											className="form-control"
											onChange={onChange}
											validate={{required: {value: true}}}
										/>
									</Col>
									<Col md="4">
										<AvField
											name="surname"
											label="Apellido"
											errorMessage="Introduce un apellido v치lido"
											onChange={onChange}
											className="form-control"
											validate={{required: {value: true}}}
										/>
									</Col>
									<Col md="4">
										<AvField
											name="age"
											label="Edad"
											type="text"
											validate={{number: true}}
											errorMessage="Introduce una edad v치lida"
											className="form-control"
											onChange={onChange}
											required
										/>
									</Col>
								</Row>
								<Row>
									<Col md="4">
										<Label>Sexo</Label>
										<AvRadioGroup
											inline
											name="gender"
											required
											errorMessage="Selecciona el sexo">
											<AvRadio
												label="Masculino"
												value="Masculino"
												onChange={onChange}
											/>
											<AvRadio
												label="Femenino"
												value="Femenino"
												onChange={onChange}
											/>
											<AvRadio label="Otro" value="Otro" onChange={onChange} />
										</AvRadioGroup>
									</Col>
									<Col md="4">
										<AvField
											type="select"
											required
											label="Nivel de confianza"
											onChange={onChange}
											name="confidenceLevels"
											errorMessage="Selecciona el nivel de confianza al que pertenece el usuario">
											<option value="">Selecciona un nivel de confianza</option>
											<option value="60316459aea69a7200c32a64">1</option>
											<option value="603165309fc13d17bcbd7089">2</option>
											<option value="603167ef9fc13d17bcbd708a">3</option>
											<option value="603168839fc13d17bcbd708b">4</option>
										</AvField>
									</Col>
									<Col md="4"></Col>
								</Row>

								<FormGroup>
									<Button
										color="primary"
										className=" waves-effect waves-light mr-2 float-right">
										A침adir
									</Button>
								</FormGroup>
							</AvForm>
						</CardBody>
					</Card>
				</Col>
			</Row>
		</React.Fragment>
	);
};

export default UpdateUser;
